description: The Canada Revenue Agency has a requirement for a Contractor to provide construction services for interior renovations to the RCMP Detachment in Musquodoboit Harbour,NS. The contract will involve a two-phase process. Phase One Qualifications – will be opened privately. Requirements will be evaluated on a pass or fail basis.
full_summary:
---

### Government Tender Announcement for Renovation Services at RCMP Detachment in Musquodoboit Harbour, Nova Scotia

#### Invitation to Qualify

**Notice Details**

* Reference Number: cb-7092-2730472
* Solicitation Number: M4000-4-0343
* Publication Date: July 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 1, 2023, 1:00 PM (AST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Cancelled

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit an Expression of Interest to provide renovation services at the RCMP Detachment in Musquodoboit Harbour, Nova Scotia.

**Services Required**

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing renovation services, including electrical, plumbing, heating, flooring, and carpentry services, among others.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection process consists of two phases. In Phase One, qualified contractors will be evaluated based on their qualifications and experience. In Phase Two, the responsive bidders from Phase One will be invited to submit a bid, which will be evaluated based on price.

**Important Information**

* The successful contractor must meet the mandatory security requirements outlined in the Invitation to Qualify document.
* The contractor is responsible for ensuring that their personnel, as well as any subcontractors, meet the security requirements.
* The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information**

* This project is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* The RCMP encourages Bidders to register in the federal Aboriginal Business Directory to access business procurement opportunities.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Sandra Bremner at sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (902) 717-5395.

### Notice of Proposed Project – GETS

The Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) is available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities for downloading bid solicitations and related documents.
